blueprint.description: Installs Zsh and Oh My Zsh! on Linux/macOS systems
blueprint.overview: [Oh My Zsh](https://ohmyz.sh/) is a delightful, open source, community-driven framework for managing your Zsh configurations. It comes bundled with thousands of helpful functions, helpers, plugins, themes, and a few things that make you shout oh my zsh!
blueprint.name: Zsh
blueprint.title: Zsh
